EmailTemplate.name: ODE Application Withdrawn-Role - DO NOT USE
EmailTemplate.subject: {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Transaction_RecordType__c} Submitted for {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_name_Formula__c} , Program Number: {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Number_Formula__c} Closed by Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ODE has closed the submitted {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Transaction_RecordType__c}for {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_name_Formula__c}, Program Number: {!CLQ_Role__c.CLQ_Program_Number_Formula__c} at the request of the provider.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
